content: +description this is a crochet pattern for the aniston a light and airy summer dress that can be made into a crop or hip length top it is made up of simple single_crochet and double_crochet v-stitches which adds to the overall unique boho beauty of this design from a day at the beach to a night out on the town to your everyday wear this dress is truly something that you need in your wardrobe this pattern includes instructions for sizes xsmall- 3xl +skill level this is a beginner level pattern +materials *approximately 700-1400 yards of size 3 light weight yarn depending on size *size i 5 5 mm crochet hook *yarn needle +more check out more of cactus and lace designs patterns here https //www etsy com/shop/cactusandlacedesigns if you have any questions or difficulties with this pattern at all please don t hesitate to message me i would love to help answer any of your questions +share your work don t forget to follow along on social media to receive updates and to share your work instagram @cactus and lace ravelry ravelry com/people/cactusandlacedesigns pinterest https //www pinterest com/cactusandlacedesigns/ please tag me @cactus and lace in your pictures of your finished items i would love to see and share them and don t forget to use the hashtag #cactusandlacedesigns
